thread.section_title: FlyDealFare.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlyDealFare.com | www.flydealfare.com | 6 of 42
thread.title: Miriam

author: Miriam
title: Miriam
text:
Not knowing this company I was very hesitant to go with them, and so I asked many questions before I would continue. But Amritpal answered all questions patiently and thoroughly . He always responded quickly and kindly, till we got our flights which we were very happy with.
I will very surely recommend and use this travel agent for future flights after our trip. Thank you
Miriam
